resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81463</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81463</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4803</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Peer Conferencing and First Phase of Publishing</string>
            <string language="es">Conferencia entre los alumnos y primera fase de publicación</string>
            <string language="ga">Comhdháil Piara agus Céad Chéim na Foilsithe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleicherconferencing und erste Phase des 
Veröffentlichens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Communication de pair et première phase de 
l'édition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conferencing do par e primeira fase de publicar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comunicazione del pari e prima fase di 
pubblicazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όμοια σύσκεψη και πρώτη φάση έκδοσης</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson encouraging children to read each other's work and respond to it via a peer conferencing setting. They also begin the preliminary stages of making a book.</string>
            <string language="es">Una lección que anima a los niños a que lean el trabajo de los otros y respondan a éste mediante el establecimiento de una conferencia de alumnos. También empiezan las etapas preliminares de hacer un libro.</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceacht a spreagann na leanaí saothar a cheile a léamh agus fregairt dó trí chomhdháil piara. Tosaíonn siad freisin ar chéad chéimeanna déanta leabhair.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="es">plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anregenkinder einer Lektion, zum der jeder des 
anderen Arbeit zu lesen und auf sie über eine Gleicher 
Conferencingeinstellung zu reagieren. Sie fangen auch die 
einleitenden Stadien des Bildens eines Buches an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enfants encourageants d'une leçon pour lire le 
travail de chacun et à répondre à lui par l'intermédiaire d'une 
configuration de communication de pair. Ils commencent 
également les étapes préliminaires de faire un livre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crianças incentivando de uma lição para ler-se 
trabalho e a responder-lhe através de um ajuste do conferencing do 
par. Começam também os estágios preliminares de fazer um 
livro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bambini consiglianti di lezione per leggere lavoro
di ciascuno e da rispondere ad esso via una regolazione di 
comunicazione del pari. Egualmente cominciano le fasi preliminari
di fare un libro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα μάθημα που ενθαρρύνει τα παιδιά για να διαβάσει 
την ο ένας του άλλου εργασία και να αποκριθεί σε την μέσω μιας 
όμοιας τιμής τών παραμέτρων σύσκεψης. Αρχίζουν επίσης τα 
προκαταρκτικά στάδια της παραγωγής ενός βιβλίου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4803</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

            </role>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>

          </context>
          <language>en</language>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>

        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
